result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. John L Betts

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: from defendant requesting huber for NA and AA meetings; cc ADA Kerri Puig; stj

Clerk Marisa. 
Case Called: 2:58 pm 
INCLUDES 16CF650, 15CF1063, 15CM2131, 16CF236, 15CM1046, AND 16CF1150. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Def appears in person, in custody with Atty Eric Eickhoff.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. VRCW.

State moves to: 
In 16CF650: Ct. 1 (Manuf/Deliver Amphetamine)>>AMEND TO Possession of Controlled Substance pursuant to 961.41(3g)(am). 
                    : Ct. 2 (Misd. BJ)>>D&RI. 
In 15CF1063: Ct. 1 (Strangulation & Suffocation)>>D&RI. 
                      : Ct. 4 (Theft)>>D&RI. 
                      : Ct. 5 (Misd. BJ)>>D&RI. 
In 15CM2131: Ct. 2 (DC)>>D&RI. 
                       : Ct. 4 (Misd. BJ)>>D&RI. 
In 16CF236: Ct. 2 (Battery)>>D&RI. 
                    : Ct. 3 (DC)>>D&RI. 
In 15CM1046: Ct. 1 (DC)>>D&RI. 
                       : Ct. 2 (Obstructing an Officer)>>D&RI. 
In 16CF1150: Ct. 1 (Threats to Injure/Accuse of Crime)>>D&RI. 
                      : Ct. 2 (Felony BJ)>>D&RI. 
                      : Ct. 3 (Felony BJ)>>D&RI. 
                      : Ct. 4 (DC)>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: 
In 16CF650: Amended Ct. 1 (Possession of Controlled Substance)>>NO CONTEST. 
In 15CF1063: Ct. 2 (Battery)>>NO CONTEST. 
                      : Ct. 3 (DC)>>NO CONTEST. 
In 15CM2131: Ct. 1 (Battery)>>NO CONTEST. 
                       : Ct. 3 (Obstructing an Officer)>>NO CONTEST. 
In 16CF236: Ct. 1 (Felony BJ)>>NO CONTEST. 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 

COURT ORDERS: 
In 16CF650: Amended Ct. 1>>SWH for 3 years probation - CONDITION: 6 months MCJ with huber for work/school/treatment - no objection to jail being served on EMP. 
In 15CF1063: Ct. 2>>SWH for 2 years probation. 
                      : Ct. 3>>SWH for 2 years probation. 
In 15CM2131: Ct. 1>>SWH for 2 years probation. 
                       : Ct. 3>>SWH for 2 years probation. 
In 16CF236: Ct. 1>>SWH for 3 years probation. 

COURT ORDERS as CONDITIONS of Probation on ALL>>assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by the dept; AODA and follow through; fulltime employment/school/combination of the 2 of at least 30 hours per week or if not, perform 9 hours CS per week - at agent's discretion based upon def's ability to work; absolute sobriety from drugs/alcohol except prescriptions taken as prescribed and with prior agent authorization; letter of apology to M.F.; absolutely no contact with M.F.; DNA sample/surcharge (1 per file); CC. 

COURT finds def entitled to NO days jail credit if revoked in 15CF1063, 15CM2131, and 16CF236 and 244 days jail credit if revoked in 16CF650. 

Adj: 3:31 pm
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 27, 2017 at 02:30 pm.

Clerk Marisa.

Case Called: 2:18 pm 
INCLUDES 15CF1063, 15CM1046, 15CM2131, AND 16CF236. 
State appears by ADA Ralph Uttke; Deft appears in person, pro se.

COURT defers ruling on bond forfeiture until deft has an attorney. 
CC set for 5/25/2016 at 1pm with Br. 3 JA to set dates.

Adj: 2:20 pm
Court quashes warrant.

Includes 15CM1046, 15CM2131, 15CF1063 and 16CF236.  No contact with victim(s): C.B., M.F. (non-waivable).  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  Absolute sobriety from controlled substances.  No controlled substnaces without valid prescription and only in the amount prescribed.
